bibl.title: Deir el-Naqlun: The Greek Papyri (P. Naqlun I); - (Plates). (Studia antiqua.)
bibl.note: P. Naqlun I, 1-14. Diss. Univ. of Warsaw, 1994. - Bibliography. - Introduction: Deir el-Naqlun and Polish Research 1986-1993. - 1-6. Biblical Papyri. Dossier of an Anchorite from Hermitage 25. - 7-8. Two Documents from the Archive of a Large Estate (?). - 9-12. Other Documents. - 13-14. Two Inscriptions on Late Roman Amphorae. - Appendix. Christian Symbol XMG [partly changed version of: Some Remarks on the Christian Symbol XMG, JJurP 22 (1992) pp. 21-27.]. - Indices. <chmg>
DERDA Tomasz, Deir el-Naqlun: The Greek Papyri (P. Naqlun I); - (Plates). (Studia antiqua.)
Warszawa, Wydawnictwa Uniwersytetu Warszawskiego, 1995, 8°, 195 pp.; - [1]-1 carte, 2 plans et 13 pll. dépl. ISBN 83-230-9820-4.
